name: Existential Speed Dating
description:
Welcome To Fernando’s Love Nest! 

Existential Speed Dating is a GB multiplayer speed dating sim where you and 4
of your closest friends can find their next partner! Answer the questions and
pass the Gameboy (or phone) around to find who is going to be together forever!
Or not.

  • Featuring 5 different characters
  •  Single device multiplayer experience
  • Playable in ROM format or Web

CONTROLS

START - ENTER

MOVEMENT - ARROW KEYS

A/Confirm selection - Z key
